collectible.title: TM 11 Sunny Day
collectible.subtitle: It has infinite uses. Ain't that great?
collectible.text:
A peculiar disc that can teach certain Pokémon the move Sunny Day. Rosa gave it to you after the game, saying that it is a custom among Gym Leaders to give a present after they lose. Since you are not a Pokémon, you can't use it, but at least it's pretty.
As a Gym Leader in the making, Rosa is still getting used to handing these out like halloween candy.

collectible.title: Princess Rosa Picture
collectible.subtitle: Inspired by Rosa's outfit in the movie ''Mystery Doors of the Magical Land.''
collectible.text: The joint power of hair buns and drills is extremely taxing on the soul. Only a few chosen can harness such a combination without instantly falling into madness. Luckily, Rosa can, which is pretty nice, cuz she looks cute imo. You can admire this look all you want thanks to this handy photograph, given for beating Rosa alongside other members of the Pokémon franchise.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Rosa and three other Pokémon characters. (Or finish a game with her valentines event costume.)

collectible.title: Scientist Rosa Picture
collectible.subtitle: Inspired by Rosa's scientist outfit from Pokéstar Studios.
collectible.text: "The time machine malfunctioned again? Dang, that's the fifth time this month. At least, it seems that the only things that vanish are my clothes... so let's just call it a happy little incident." You can admire this look all you want thanks to this handy photograph you got for beating Rosa with a handicap.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Rosa while starting with five layers or fewer. (Or finish a game with her scientist costume.)

collectible.title: Rosa's Hat
collectible.subtitle: Trendy Unovan Fashion
collectible.text: This pink and white visor is one of the most prominent parts of Rosa's outfit, and you have a copy of it! Any fan of hers would be keen to have one, after all. As a reward for helping Magma Grunt meet the movie star, you can now wear Rosa's hat for yourself.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game against Rosa and the Team Magma Grunt where they both lose.
